Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Manchester in 1969...
Injured on 5/13/1970 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1972 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1973, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1973, hitting .714 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1973, hitting .396 with 4 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1973...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1974...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Northeastern on 4/16/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1976, hitting .474 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Diablo on 5/7/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
